title: Looking for Gold DUo
body:
Hello all,
I have recently dropped from g1 to g4, 
yes I know, horrible. I am looking for someone that knows how to play, is reliable and not a hit and miss.
I understand we all have out bad games, so if we play lets keep it in mind.

Username: Ryestorm 

Msg more for any more questions and if you want a game.

Thanks
